name: The Attic (Crabman)
description:
My very first attempt at a text adventure (from 10 years ago, can you believe!?)

As usual, made mostly out of curiosity. The engine is not very powerful, as it's written from scratch, but I'm thinking of uploading it just for the heck of it. Maybe someone is interested in tinkering with it or building on it just for fun. (EDIT: Said and done.)

Also, is this the first time that Hypnotic Owl is mentioned? Quite possibly! And it predates Firefly, which has the first appeareance of the logo, by 2 years! Whaaaat!
